data.text: Me ba, sɛ wotie me nsɛm,
sɛ wowɛn wʼaso ma nyansa
na woma wo nne so frɛ nhunumu
na sɛ wohwehwɛ no te sɛ deɛ wohwehwɛ dwetɛ
ɛno na wobɛte Awurade suro ase
Awurade ma nimdeɛ,
Ɔkora nkonimdie ma wɔn a wɔteneɛ,
ɔwɛn deɛ ɔtene akwan,
Ɛno na wobɛte deɛ ɛyɛ ne deɛ ɛyɛ pɛ
Afei nyansa bɛwura wʼakoma mu,
Adwene bɛbɔ wo ho ban
Nyansa bɛyi wo afiri amumuyɛfoɔ akwan mu,
na wɔmane firi akwan pa so
wɔn a wɔn ani gye bɔneyɛ ho,
wɔn a wɔn akwan yɛ kɔntɔnkye
Nimdeɛ bɛgye wo afiri ɔbaa waresɛefoɔ no nsam,
deɛ wagyaa ne mmabaawaberɛ mu kunu
Ne fie yɛ ɛkwan a ɛkɔ owuo mu
Obiara a ɔkɔ ne nkyɛn no nsane mma
Enti wobɛdi nnipa pa anammɔn akyi
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔn a wɔtene bɛtena asase no so,
na wɔbɛtwa amumuyɛfoɔ afiri asase no so,
